July 6, 1907 D North Skelton Contest
North Skelton Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
north-skelton-contest
None
Gems of Haydn [arr. W. Rimmer]
North Skelton, County Durham Promoted by the North Skelton Hope to Prosper Band 3rd and 4th prizes divided between Skelton Old, and Charlton's Star of Hope. March contest 1st Cleveland Steel Works, 2nd Charlton's Star of Hope. 4 bands competed.
March 25, 2012, 9:08 p.m. July 2, 2015, 9:40 p.m.
1 Cleveland Steel Works T. Winter
2 Skinningrove Miners Prize Silver Band William Layman
3 Charltons Star of Hope T. Hunter
3 Skelton Old William Holdsworth
